articles.title: Kim Jong Il Congratulates Hu Jintao on CPC Anniversary
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Congratulates Hu Jintao on CPC Anniversary
Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il on Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Hu Jintao, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and president of China.
					 The message said:
					
					 I, on behalf of the WPK Central Committee and on my own behalf, extend warmest congratulations and comradely greetings to you and, through you, to the CPC Central Committee, all the members of your party and other Chinese people on the 90th anniversary of the CPC.
					
					 The founding of the CPC was a historic event which marked an occasion of a decisive turn in carrying out the Chinese revolution and carving out the destiny of the Chinese people.
					
					 Thanks to its founding the Chinese people came to have their genuine guiding vanguard and could work world-startling miracles through a gigantic struggle and creation to eradicate centuries-old backwardness and poverty and achieve the country's prosperity.
					
					 From the very day of its birth the CPC had organized and led to a great victory the bloody revolutionary war against imperialists and reactionaries at home, building new socialist China on its vast land.
					
					 The CPC laid down the line of socialist construction with Chinese characteristics suited to its specific conditions and aroused creative zeal of the broad masses to remarkably boost the country's overall national power and its international prestige in a historically short period.
					
					 The triumphant path covered by the CPC for nine decades fully demonstrated the validity and invincible vitality of its leadership and the socialist cause.
					
					 Our Party and people are rejoiced over as their own over all the successes achieved by the Chinese people in socialist construction under the leadership of the CPC and sincerely congratulate them.
					
					 The Chinese people have embarked on the new advance to attain the high goal of the 12th Five-Year Plan and build a harmonious socialist society based on the scientific outlook on development.
					
					 I heartily wish the CPC with you as its general secretary greater successes in building a comprehensively well-off society and achieving the complete reunification of the whole country by maintaining social stability and achieving sustainable development of the economy, while firmly adhering to the idea of governing for the people.
					
					 The traditional DPRK-China friendship has greeted a new heyday thanks to the joint efforts of both sides, given strong impetus to socialist construction in the two countries and greatly contributed to peace and stability of the region.
					
					 It is the steadfast stand of our Party to protect and steadily consolidate and develop the friendship, precious asset common to the two parties and the two peoples.
					
					 Believing that the traditional friendship would grow stronger generation after generation in line with the common desire and wishes of the parties and peoples of the two countries, I sincerely hope that the People's Republic of China will prosper and the Chinese people enjoy happiness under the leadership of the CPC.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Acquaints Himself with Steel Production
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Acquaints Himself with Steel Production
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim acquainted himself with the steel production at the Chollima Steel Complex on the spot on Wednesday.
					 He looked round the blooming mill and the rolling shop and raw material and revolving furnace shops of the Posan Iron Works and convened a consultative meeting there.
					
					 The meeting discussed the issue of providing the construction sites of Mansudae area and other major projects with sufficient quantities of iron and steel and technical issues of transporting scrap iron to the complex in good time.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group Accused of Its Plan to Develop Tourist Destinations
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Its Plan to Develop Tourist Destinations
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean regime announced a plan to develop five islands in the West Sea including Paekryong and Yonphyong into international tourist destinations. 
					 The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea on Thursday issued information bulletin No. 974 in this regard.
					
					 The information bulletin said:
					
					 The puppet regime plans to turn the five islands and waters around them into tourist destinations though they are very acute waters where a war may break out any moment. This is little short of a dangerous project to build tourist resorts on powder magazines.
					
					 The group of traitors is busy with the project to develop the Demilitarized Zone along the Military Demarcation Line for the purpose of confrontation with the DPRK and money-making, advertising that the area will become a "security tourist resort" and "eco-friendly peace park."
					
					 Its projects to develop tourist resorts are despicable ideas which can be conceived only by such dealers as the Lee Myung Bak group utterly indifferent to the tragedy of the nation's division and disgrace brought by the confrontation among the fellow countrymen.
					
					 The group is talking about "international tourist resorts" while massively reinforcing armed forces on the five islands in the West Sea and waters around them and setting up even the command for the defence of its northwest islands. This is a mockery of the public opinion and another provocation to the DPRK.
					
					 Through the project the group is seeking to conceal its preparations for a war against the DPRK, make the "northern limit line", an illegal ghost line, an established fact, and get its dominium over the waters in the West Sea publicly recognized.
					
					 It also intends to tone down the anger of the south Korean people including islanders who feel uneasiness and horror about military exercises and bring to the islands not only inhabitants but tourists to use them as "human shields" in the military showdown with the DPRK.
					
					 A war knows no mercy, and tourist resorts can by no means be safe.

articles.title: S. Korean Ministry of Unification Accused of Failed Negotiations
articles.content:
S. Korean Ministry of Unification Accused of Failed Negotiations
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Guidance Bureau of Special Zone for International Tour of Mt. Kumgang gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Thursday as negotiations for settling the readjustment of properties including real estate inside the special zone proved abortive due to the obstructive moves of the south Korean puppet authorities.
					 Those concerned of the south side, as notified by the DPRK Guidance Bureau of Special Zone for International Tour of Mt. Kumgang, entered the Mt. Kumgang Resort on June 29 for the readjustment of properties including real estate inside the special zone.
					
					 But those concerned of non-governmental enterprises which have their properties in the mountain resort were just four and other 30 odd medium and small enterprises were barred from coming there by the south Korean puppet Ministry of Unification. Moreover, several "government" officials came to disturb the work with those concerned of enterprises.
					
					 Entering the resort, a section chief of the ministry and other officials took those concerned of non-governmental enterprises to other room, not the venue of negotiations. They kept the DPRK side from meeting with those concerned of non-governmental enterprises, insisting on having negotiations between the authorities of both sides. They threatened to go back unless the DPRK side has negotiations with them.
					
					 When the DPRK side stated it would clarify its stand in the presence of all those concerned of the south side, they categorically refused it. Finally, they hastily went back without notice, taking with them even those concerned of non-governmental enterprises on the instructions from Seoul.
					
					 The south Korean businessmen lost an opportunity to meet with those concerned of the DPRK side in the resort and were compelled to go back to south Korea under the pressure of the ministry officials.
					
					 It was brought to light that the ministry sent its officials to the resort along with some businessmen under the pressure of public opinion but the real purpose of their trip was not to "protect the right to properties" of south Korean enterprises but to disturb the readjustment of real estate and scuttle the international tour of the DPRK side at any cost. 
					
					 Due to the rude behavior of the ministry, the DPRK side had no alternative but to convey as a notice its proposal for readjustment of properties to those concerned of enterprises of the south side including Hyundai Asan who are staying in the mountain resort.
					
					 In the notice the DPRK side said that all those who have properties in the resort are requested to come there by July 13 after studying the proposal and in case of those who fail to appear there by that time, the DPRK side will consider they quit their properties and take relevant legal steps.
					
					  The negotiations failed to take place entirely due to the deliberate obstructions on the part of puppet Ministry of Unification bossed by Hyon In Thaek, die-hard confrontation maniac.
					
					 Nevertheless, upon their return the ministry officials were so shameless as to spread misinformation.
					
					 The DPRK has shown all sincerity for the fair handling of the properties of the south Korean businessmen.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should stop at once the base moves to scuttle the international tour of Mt. Kumgang and allow enterprises of the south side to take active part in readjusting their properties in a reasonable way.
					
					 Otherwise, the south Korean businesses will suffer losses and the south Korean authorities will be held wholly responsible for them.

articles.title: Banquet Hosted by Chinese Ambassador
articles.content:
Banquet Hosted by Chinese Ambassador
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Chinese Ambassador Liu Hongcai hosted a banquet at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel Thursday to mark the 90th anniversary of the Communist Party of China.
					 Present there on invitation were Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Choe Yong Rim, premier of the Cabinet, Kim Ki Nam and Choe Thae Bok, secretaries of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kang Sok Ju, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs, Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, Choe Chang Sik, minister of Public Health who doubles as chairman of the C.C., the DPRK-China Friendship Association, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and others.
					
					 Present there were staff members of the Chinese embassy here, Chinese guests staying in the DPRK, Chinese students and residents.
					
					 Liu Hongcai said at the banquet that the two parties, two governments and two peoples have struggled shoulder to shoulder against the aggression by outside forces both in the period of the struggle for national independence and liberation and in the period of the socialist revolution and construction.
					
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited China for several times and met with leading officials of the Chinese party and state including General Secretary Hu Jintao and clarified the orientation of the development of Sino-DPRK relations, he stressed.
					
					 He expressed conviction that the relations between the two parties and the two countries would greet more beautiful future thanks to the joint efforts by the two sides.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam said in his speech that the glorious course covered by the CPC over the last nine decades taught the Chinese people the profound truth that there is no new China without the CPC.
					
					 A series of historic meetings held by the top leaders of the two parties marked an important occasion in helping the two parties and peoples of the two countries boost their friendship and solidarity and dynamically promoting the socialist constructions in the two countries, he added.
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the WPK and the DPRK government to boost and carry forward the DPRK-China friendly and cooperative relations through generations, he said, declaring: We will make every possible effort together with the Chinese comrades to satisfactorily implement the issues agreed upon between the top leaders of the two parties in various fields.
					
					 Meanwhile, Chinese Consul General in Chongjin Dong Minjie arranged a reception on Wednesday.

articles.title: Philippine Foreign Ministry Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Philippine Foreign Ministry Delegation Arrives
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Philippine Foreign Ministry led by Vice-Minister Erlinda F. Basilio arrived here by air Thursday.

articles.title: New DPRK Ambassador to South Africa Appointed
articles.content:
New DPRK Ambassador to South Africa Appointed
						
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Jo Yong Man was appointed as DPRK ambassador to South Africa, according to a decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.title: Sports Contest for Songun Torch Prize Closes
articles.content:
Sports Contest for Songun Torch Prize Closes
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The Sports Contest for Songun Torch Prize was closed in the DPRK.
					 North Phyongan Province came first in total standing by winning in men's soccer, women's basketball, men's table-tennis, women's boxing and women's marathon and other events.
					
					 South Phyongan Province placed first in women's football and women's volleyball, North Hamgyong Province in men's basketball, women's table-tennis and men's and women's track and field and South Hwanghae Province in men's marathon.
					
					 Its closing ceremony took place in Chongjin, North Hamgyong Province Thursday.

articles.title: Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize Closes
articles.content:
Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize Closes
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The 37th National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize closed with due ceremony at the Cultural House in South Phyongan Province on Wednesday.
					 The contest was divided into groups of secondary and primary schools.
					
					 Boy players of Pyongyang Ryongwang Secondary School and girl players of Sangha Secondary School in Sariwon City of North Hwanghae Province and Hero Sinchang Secondary School in Pukchong County of South Hamgyong Province came first in defense sports matches while boy players of Jajak Secondary School in Kaechon City of South Phyongan Province and girl players of Pyongyang Kwanmun Secondary School placed first in volleyball matches.
					
					 Boy players of Pyongyang June 9 Ryongbuk Secondary School and girl players of Pyongyang Kwangbokgori Secondary School came first in table tennis, boy players of Sinhung Secondary School in Hamhung City of South Hamgyong Province and girl players of Pyongyang Bulgungori Secondary School in tennis and boy players of Sonbong Secondary School in Rason City of North Hamgyong Province and girl players of Palsan Secondary School in Yonan County of South Hwanghae Province in badminton.
					
					 Boy players of Pyongyang Hasin Primary School and girl players of Kyongam Primary School in Sariwon City came first in table tennis in the group of primary schools.

articles.title: New Postage Stamps Issued
articles.content:
New Postage Stamps Issued
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea published a new stamp introducing the Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm.
					 The sheet shows a vast apple orchard.
					
					 The State Stamp Bureau also issued individual stamps with pictures of plants belonging to the orchid family.

articles.title: Comedian Sin Bul Chul
articles.content:
Comedian Sin Bul Chul
						
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Sin Sang Hak was a celebrated comedian, writer and poet with uncommon sense, nimble wit and ingenious narrative art.
					 Born in 1907 in Kaesong City in the central part of Korea, he used to move people to laughter with his gifted eloquence.
					
					 Driven by feelings of hatred for the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists, he changed his name as Sin Bul Chul, reproaching himself for his birth.
					
					 Unafraid of the Japanese imperialists' suppression, he wrote comedies fraught with anti-Japanese sentiments and performed them alone.
					
					 During the Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953), he wrote many comedies conducive to the victory of the Korean people in the war.
					
					 In the post-war period, he created and performed such comedies as "'President' Alarmed by the Appeal" and "March of Downfall".
					
					 He died at the end of the 1960s before finishing the compilation of the book "History of Korean Comedies".
					
					"Collection of Sin Bul Chul's Comedies" was published in the country after his death.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Accused of Its Provocations against DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Its Provocations against DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The spokesmen for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army and the DPRK government in statements strongly condemned the south Korean regime for its serious provocations against the DPRK.
					 The provocations touched off public resentment against the south Korean regime.
					
					 Jang In Gap, a 51-year-old resident in Taesong District, Pyongyang, told KCNA the DPRK people are enraged at the south Korean regime for having insulted the social system and dignity of the DPRK again. The grave provocation deserves a stern punishment, he said. 
					
					 Kim Kwang Gun, vice-minister of Machine-building Industry, said south Korean frontline units, including "Skull with Cross Bones", put up slogans and placards slandering the DPRK. 
					
					 The architect of the provocation is none other than traitor Lee Myung Bak and military bosses, he noted. The provocation is tantamount to a downright challenge to the DPRK and a declaration of war, he said, adding:
					
					 The provocations the south Korean regime has committed one after another in June are premeditated plots against the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 During the office of Lee persistently pursuing antagonism towards the north and dependence on outside forces, no progress has been made in the effort of the Korean nation for the country's reunification, peace and stability.
					
					 Ryang Jong Gum, a lecturer of the National House of Class Education, said it is the DPRK people's view that the dignity of the leadership is precisely the dignity and honor common to the nation and defending it is their obligation.
					
					 The south Korean regime slandering even the dignity of the DPRK leadership and seeking confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north is the Korean nation's common foe who should be punished without delay, she added.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Accused of Worst Provocation to DPRK
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Accused of Worst Provocation to DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Those who are keen on provocations hurting the system and dignity of the DPRK will never go scot-free on this land and in this sky.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday warns this in a byline article.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors displayed slogans hurting the army and system of the DPRK at barracks and posts of forefront units and various other places, stoking extreme hostility toward it, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The evermore reckless acts of the puppet forces against the nation are a blatant challenge to the efforts to repair the inter-Korean relations and achieve peace on the Korean Peninsula and unpardonable hideous provocation against the system and dignity of the DPRK.
					
					 Lee group's above-said provocations are a revelation of its treacherous design to escalate inter-Korean confrontation and tensions and an inevitable product of its moves to ignite a war against the DPRK.
					
					 The Lee group has never had any idea of having normal relations with the DPRK but sought to do harm to the dignified socialist system in the DPRK through plots and conspiracy.
					
					 The incident in which the group set up targets and fired at them and the hideous provocation perpetrated by it recently are the height of its moves to launch a war of aggression on the DPRK. It is the sinister scenario of the group to get on the nerves of the DPRK politically and militarily and escalate tensions and thus start a war against it.
					
					 The final conclusion drawn by the DPRK under the present grave situation is that no problem can be settled and only a war may break out as long as the Lee group is allowed to stay in power as it is hell-bent on confrontation with fellow countrymen. The DPRK remains strong in its resolution that there is no need to sit face-to-face with the group of traitors but settle accounts with it only by force of arms.

articles.title: Traitor Lee Myung Bak Branded Chieftain of Anti-DRPK Confrontation Racket
articles.content:
Traitor Lee Myung Bak Branded Chieftain of Anti-DRPK Confrontation Racket
						
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces' anti-DRPK confrontation racket is getting so grave as to stun the public at home and abroad. Lee Myung Bak is the chieftain of it.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes this in a bylined commentary.
					
					 Traitor Lee is steeped in the inveterate rejection of the DPRK and wild ambition to invade it to the marrow of his bones, the news analyst says, and goes on:
					
					 The puppet forces' moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK are getting evermore undisguised at the prodding of Lee and according to the premeditated scenario of the military. Now that they have gone the lengths of crying they would not rule out even a war against the DPRK, going beyond their blatant challenge to its dignity and system, it is quite unreasonable for the DPRK to remain a passive onlooker to this. 
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group can never shirk off the responsibility for the prevailing grave situation. The puppet authorities should make an immediate apology for their reckless acts and unconditionally punish the prime movers as demanded by the DPRK.
					
					 If the group of traitors persists in provocations, paying no heed to the DPRK's warning, it will not escape a miserable end in face of a merciless punishment by the army and people of the DPRK.

articles.title: Anti-Imperialist Struggle Called for
articles.content:
Anti-Imperialist Struggle Called for 
						
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The wilder the imperialists run, the more stubborn anti-imperialist struggle the progressives of the world should wage through their concerted efforts. This alone will help hasten the victory of the cause of global independence.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 The anti-imperialist struggle is the essential requirement for accomplishing the cause of global independence and the advance and victory of popular masses' cause of independence hinge on the successes of the anti-imperialist struggle, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The popular masses' cause of independence is the noble revolutionary cause of terminating aggression and war, domination and subjugation and realizing independence of the popular masses.
					
					 The people aspiring after independence and peace should clearly see through the reactionary nature and wickedness of imperialism and hold high the banner of the anti-imperialist struggle.
					
					 It is a prerequisite to the anti-imperialist struggle and a primary requirement for global independence to discard illusion and horror about imperialism.
					
					 If the people are well aware of the position and weakness of imperialism finding itself in a more bottomless predicament, they will not harbor any illusion and fear of it.
					
					 The victory in the cause of global independence depends on the unity of the anti-imperialist independent countries. Now that the imperialists perpetrate aggression and war as allied forces, it is an essential task of the times for ensuring the victory in the cause of global independence for all the anti-imperialist independent forces to get united in their struggle.  
					
					 Boosting the capability for self-defence provides a sure guarantee for encouraging the people to turn out in the anti-imperialist struggle with confidence and successfully accelerate the cause of global independence.
					
					 The military strength constitutes the most important of the national power. If they emerge victorious on the military front, they can win on all fronts.
					
					 The DPRK is doing everything as it is determined and pushing forward every affair, guided by its grit, not bound to anything, proceeding from its steadfast independent stand in politics. This is because it has powerful military muscle and ever-victorious strategy and tactics.

articles.title: Sports Games Held in S. Korea to Implement Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Sports Games Held in S. Korea to Implement Joint Declaration
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The June 15 Mountaineering Society for Reunification in south Korea held sports games in Seoul on June 26 to implement the June 15 joint declaration.
					 Attending there were the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy, the Bar Association for Democratic Society and the Seoul Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration and others. 
					
					 Kwon O Hon, permanent chairman of the Society, said at the ceremony of opening the games that members of different circles are filled with the ardent desire for reunification greeting the 11th anniversary of the joint declaration.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak "government," however, is openly committing criminal acts against reunification and the nation in a total negation of the joint declaration, he charged.
					
					 He called upon all the people desirous of peace and reunification to implement the joint declaration.
					
					 Then followed football, track and field events and other sports games.

articles.title: US Forces Accused of Having Concealed Environmental Pollution in S. Korea
articles.content:
US Forces Accused of Having Concealed Environmental Pollution in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The People's Measure Council on Defoliant Case in south Korea held a press conference outside the U.S. military base in Ryongsan, Seoul, on June 27 denouncing the U.S. forces in south Korea for having concealed environmental pollution inside the Waegwan U.S. military base.
					 Speakers at the conference noted that reports on a series of surveys made by the U.S. forces present in south Korea into the contaminated soil and underground water in their base in Waegwan since 1992 have been disclosed recently. 
					
					 According to the reports, it was made known during the surveys that dioxin was detected and mercury was 800 times that of the legal limit, various kinds of carcinogen 1,000 times, 2,400 times and 4,000 times at the maximum that of the allowed level, they noted.
					
					 These unimaginable levels prove that the contamination level was getting serious from long ago due to the storage, leakage and burial of various kinds of toxic materials inside the base, they held.
					
					 They declared that they would form an investigation team with experts to directly survey environmental pollution and probe the truth about it.
					
					 They urged the U.S. forces to open to public all the surveyed information about environmental pollution inside their base in Waegwan and revise the south Korea-U.S. "Status of Forces Agreement" so that the occurrence of environmental pollution might be informed immediately in the future.

articles.title: Authorities' Suppression of Shipyard Workers Slammed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Authorities' Suppression of Shipyard Workers Slammed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Members of civic and public organizations in Pusan area including the Pusan Headquarters of the Confederation of Trade Unions and opposition parties of south Korea held a press conference in front of the Yongdo Shipyard on June 27 to protest against the authorities' crackdown upon the workers in their actions for vital rights.
					 The press conference took place despite cordon thrown by law-enforcement agents and riot police around the shipyard by the order of the court authorities to forcibly dissolve workers in their actions inside the yard.
					
					 Speakers at the conference accused the business side and power organs of preparing a wholesale crackdown upon the workers in sit-in strike.
					
					 There is no justification for them to crack down on the workers' struggle, they said, declaring the workers and all the forces of conscience would counter the authorities' suppression with solidarity actions.
					
					 They demanded the authorities cancel their repressive plan at once.

articles.title: S. Korea: Stop to Suppression of Youth Organization Urged
articles.content:
S. Korea: Stop to Suppression of Youth Organization Urged
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Youth Solidarity issued a statement on June 27 demanding that the security authorities stop the suppression of the progressive youth organization.
					 The statement recalled that on June 23 the security investigation group of the Kangwon District Police Agency and the Kangwon Branch of the Intelligence Service searched houses of three persons including the former chairman of the Kangrung Youth Society on charges of the violation of the "National Security Law" and confiscated computers, documents, books, etc.
					
					 The security authorities have persistently resorted to the wholesale suppression of members of youth organizations of south Korean Kangwon Province, North Chungchong Province and Jeju Island after labeling the past activities of the Council of Youth Organizations (Hanchong) as "ones benefiting the enemy", the statement charged.
					
					 Hanchong was a massive youth organization built by more than 50 youth organizations across south Korea active for democratization of society and reunification, it held.
					
					 Intolerable is the suppression of the just activities on the strength of the NSL which should have been already abolished, it said, noting that the recent case was part of the repressive campaign to tide over the regime's crisis.
					
					 The statement called upon young people across south Korea to fight it out to get the NSL abolished and realize democracy in solidarity with many citizens.

articles.title: Juche Idea Praised by Russian Official
articles.content:
Juche Idea Praised by Russian Official
						
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Gennadi Astakhov, chief of the Tynda City Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of the Russian Philosophy Association, praised the validity and vitality of the Juche idea in his appearance on Amur Region TV on June 19.
					 The Juche idea fathered by President Kim Il Sung is an independent idea clarifying the fundamental principles to be maintained in achieving the independence and sovereignty of each country. 
					
					 The requirements of the Juche idea have been fully met in all the fabrics of the social life in the DPRK, he said, adding the Songun politics based on this idea is in full force.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Bangladeshi Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Bangladeshi Newspaper
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The full text of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Some Questions in Understanding the Juche Philosophy" was carried by the Bangladeshi newspaper Blits on June 26.
					 The work was published on April 2, Juche 63 (1974). It says the Juche philosophy is one centered on man, which raised the fundamental problem of philosophy centered on man and clarified the view, outlook and stand on the world. Also expounded in the work is the difference of this philosophy from human philosophy.

articles.title: GIs' Crimes against Koreans during War Disclosed by Russian Newspaper
articles.content:
GIs' Crimes against Koreans during War Disclosed by Russian Newspaper
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The 24th issue of the Russian newspaper Patriot carried a photo-accompanied article disclosing the monstrous crimes committed by the U.S. imperialists against the Korean people during the Korean War. The article was titled "U.S. Forces' Crimes."
					 It recounted stories about how indiscriminately the U.S. imperialists killed peaceable civilians during the war.
					
					 It quoted a report released at that time by an investigation group of the Women's International Democratic Federation as saying the massacre and torture practiced by the U.S. imperialists put into the shade those committed by Hitler Nazis during their temporary occupation of Europe.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists dropped bombs on factories, schools, hospitals and lots of other buildings, turning them into heaps of debris. They also massively used internationally banned germ and chemical weapons, the paper said.
					
					 The U.S. forces committed the worst crimes in human history during the war, the paper said, stressing the U.S. forces' crimes should be punished in the name of humankind for justice and future.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at WPK C.C. Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at WPK C.C. Marked Abroad
Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The 47th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea was marked in foreign countries from June 14 to 18.
					 A seminar was held in Brazil, a reading session in Uganda, a lecture in Indonesia and an art performance in Vietnam.
					
					 The chairman of the Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea said Kim Jong Il clarified the philosophical principle of the Juche idea in his work "On the Juche Idea". He noted with appreciation that the DPRK has maintained independence in all the fields of socialist construction including politics, economy and culture and turned into a military power thanks to the original Songun politics.
					
					 Victories will always be in store for the Korean people guided by the Juche idea, he added.
					
					 The chief of the Group for the Study of Songun Politics of the Kampala Coloro Higher Middle School of Uganda said the WPK developed into an invincible party that has thoroughly embodied the great Juche idea in its building and activities with its roots deeply struck among the popular masses since Kim Jong Il started his work at the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 The art troupe of the Youth Theatre of Vietnam put on the stage colorful numbers including Korean and Vietnamese songs.

articles.title: Fukushima Nuclear Crisis Gets Worse
articles.content:
Fukushima Nuclear Crisis Gets Worse 
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The prospect for defusing the nuclear crisis at the Fukushima Nuclear Power Plant of Japan is still gloomy.
					 Recently the plant began operating equipment to decontaminate radioactive substances from water. But the radiation level in the vicinity of the absorption tower was so high that the plant could not but stop the operation in less than five hours.
					
					 Tokyo Electric Power Co. predicts the tower might have absorbed oil or mud containing radioactive material more than expected.
					
					 430 mSv radiation per hour was detected in the basement of Reactor No. 2 building of the power plant.
					
					 The radioactive contamination fear is rising nationwide.
					
					 The Tokyo Shimbun reported radioactive cesium exceeding the allowed level set by the Ministry of Agriculture, Forest and Fisheries was detected in feed grass collected in Nasusiobara City and Nasu chon, Tochigi Prefecture.
					
					 The Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology opened to public a map showing the soil contamination in which cesium stored in the surface of soil was measured within 100-200km radius from the troubled power plant.
					
					 According to it, radioactive cesium was found 100,000-300,000 Bq per a square meter of soil in Tochigi Prefecture neighboring Fukushima Prefecture and the north of Ibaraki Prefecture. This proved that radiation contamination is reaching the capital.
					
					 Meanwhile, a research group of a university in Japan released a study results saying lots of radiation material that leaked into the air following the accident at the Fukushima Nuclear Power Plant flew to Europe by a jet stream.

articles.title: Citation Meeting Held in China to Mark 90th Anniversary of CPC
articles.content:
Citation Meeting Held in China to Mark 90th Anniversary of CPC
 Beijing, June 29 (KCNA) -- The Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Communist Party and the Ministry of Supervision of China recently held a citation meeting for activities to mark the 90th anniversary of the CPC and build advanced basic party organizations and help its members become good members and commended advanced basic party organizations, good party members and party officials.
					 He Yong, deputy secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the CPC, speaking at the meeting, called upon discipline inspection and supervision organs at all levels and broad strata of officials to substantially work with high responsibility for the Party and the people, build advanced basic party organizations at their worksites and become good party members and thus perform feats in the work to combat corruption and promote uprightness.

articles.title: Show of Achievements Held in China to Mark Anniversary of CPC
articles.content:
Show of Achievements Held in China to Mark Anniversary of CPC
						
 Beijing, June 29 (KCNA) -- A show of achievements in the work of party newspaper and periodicals was recently held at the National Agriculture Exhibition in Beijing to mark the 90th anniversary of the Communist Party of China.
					 Displayed there were more than 100 party newspapers and periodicals published in different parts of the country.
					
					 It showed the history of the information service and publication of party newspaper and periodicals which have developed under the leadership of the CPC over the past 90 years.

articles.title: China Calls for Intensified Ideological and Political Construction at Military Academies
articles.content:
China Calls for Intensified Ideological and Political Construction at Military Academies
 Beijing, June 29 (KCNA) -- Xu Caihou, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Communist Party of China and vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission, stressed the need to step up the ideological and political construction at military academies. He said this when touring them in Jiangsu and Anhui Provinces recently.
					 The military academies are playing an important strategic role in army building as they are important bases for training talents and effecting theoretical and scientific and technological innovations, he noted.
					
					 He called upon the military academies across the country to honestly implement series of important theories and instructions of President Hu Jintao on building a strong nation with talents and promoting the development of education and thus train many military talents of new type equipped with high qualifications.

articles.title: China Calls for Cultural Construction in Remote Autonomous Regions
articles.content:
China Calls for Cultural Construction in Remote Autonomous Regions
 Beijing, June 29 (KCNA) -- Liu Yunshan, head of the Publicity Department of the C.C., Communist Party of China, called for opening a new phase of cultural construction in the remote autonomous regions. He said this when touring the Inner Mongolian Autonomous Region recently.
					 The remote autonomous regions have rich history and culture, eco-culture and resources of tribal culture of nationalities, he said, underlining the need to positively develop the rich contents of the sources of culture.
					
					 He called for efforts to provide the people of all nationalities with happiness to steadily hew out a new phase of the cultural construction in the remote autonomous regions.

articles.title: China to Ensure Absolute Leadership of Party over Army
articles.content:
China to Ensure Absolute Leadership of Party over Army
 Beijing, June 29 (KCNA) -- Guo Boxiong, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Communist Party of China and vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission, stressed the need to ensure the absolute leadership of the Party over the army recently when inspecting units in Yunnan Province.
					 To do so is related to the nature and aim of the people's army, the issue of consolidating the Party's governing position and improving the governing capacity and the long-term stability of the state, he said.
					
					 He called upon all the units to give full play to the good tradition of the Chinese army obeying the Party's command, serving the people and bravely fighting and thus open a new phase of the scientific development of army building and carry through all duties assigned by the Party and the people.

articles.title: Contest on Knowledge of Party History Closes in China
articles.content:
Contest on Knowledge of Party History Closes in China
 Beijing, June 29 (KCNA) -- The contest on knowledge of the party history closed recently. It began in April to mark the 90th anniversary of the Communist Party of China.
					 It was co-sponsored by the Party History Research Center of the CPC Central Committee, the People's Daily Office and the Ministry of Education. Attending it were party members, officials, popular masses, youth and children.
					
					 Prizes were conferred on 230 participants in the contest.

articles.title: Russia, China Check US Unilateral Attempt
articles.content:
Russia, China Check US Unilateral Attempt
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Russia and China recently checked the unilateral attempt of the U.S. to open to public a report related to Iran at the UNSC.
					 According to Voice of Russia, the two countries took such step, stating that information reflected in the report was unbelievable.
					
					 The UNSC should not be allowed to adopt any resolution on the basis of uncertain or politically-motivated information, the Russian mission in the UN stressed.

articles.title: NATO, US Soldiers Killed in Afghanistan, Iraq
articles.content:
NATO, US Soldiers Killed in Afghanistan, Iraq
						
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- More NATO soldiers in Afghanistan and U.S. soldiers in Iraq met deaths due to the military operations of the resistance forces.
					 Three NATO soldiers were killed on Sunday in an Improvised Explosive Device (IED) blast in southern and western Afghanistan. 
					
					 A total of 267 NATO soldiers, most of them Americans, have been killed in Afghanistan since the beginning of this year.
					
					 Two U.S. soldiers were killed in northern Iraq during operations on Sunday.
					
					 Meanwhile, a NATO helicopter crashed in south Afghanistan on June 23.

articles.title: US Authorities Urged to Revise Cyber Strategy
articles.content:
US Authorities Urged to Revise Cyber Strategy
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- If the present U.S. administration is to counter hacking attack, it should revise its cyber strategy, first of all. Thomas, chief in charge of researches of the Chicago International Affairs Consultative Council, an academic organization of the U.S., said this in an article contributed recently to the British paper Financial Times.
					 It will be difficult for the U.S. to properly counter hacking attack with the double standards on the cyber warfare, he said. 
					
					 He accused the present U.S. administration of taking its cyber attack as a secret operation similar to intelligence while regarding other countries' hacking attack as a war deed.

articles.title: US Criticizes Japan over Territorial Issue
articles.content:
US Criticizes Japan over Territorial Issue
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The United States criticized Japan over the Japan-Russia dealing over the "northern territories," according to a U.S. diplomatic message opened to public by WikiLeaks.
					 In April 2009 the U.S. embassy in Tokyo in this message to the mainland said Japan has neither plan for negotiations on return of territories nor leader to push forward it.

articles.title: Explosive Devices Found in US
articles.content:
Explosive Devices Found in US
						
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Two bombs were found inside a Borders Bookstore in a suburban Denver shopping mall in Colorado State, the U.S. on June 25.
					 The police were summoned and discovered evidence of forced entry and found two explosive devices, it was reported.

articles.title: More Gun-related Crime in US
articles.content:
More Gun-related Crime in US
						
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- One more gun-related crime occurred in Washington D.C. on Saturday, causing big uneasiness and fear among inhabitants.
					 Four people were shot, with one in critical condition.

articles.title: Pakistan Demands Withdrawal of British Military Instructor
articles.content:
Pakistan Demands Withdrawal of British Military Instructors
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Pakistan recently demanded the withdrawal of 20 British military instructors from his country as regards the security issue.
					 Such step is an expression of Pakistan's ever-mounting complaint about the West's policy, BBC reported.

articles.title: Pakistanis Killed in US Drone Strikes
articles.content:
Pakistanis Killed in US Drone Strikes
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The U.S. forces in Afghanistan are killing Pakistanis under the pretext of "anti-terrorism".
					 At least 26 people were killed in two U.S. drone strikes launched Monday in Pakistan's northwest tribal area of South Waziristan.
					
					 This has lashed the inhabitants into fury.

articles.title: Leader of Iranian Islamic Revolution Accuses US of Terrorism
articles.content:
Leader of Iranian Islamic Revolution Accuses US of Terrorism
 Tehran, June 29 (KCNA) -- Seyed Ali Khamenei, leader of the Islamic Revolution of Iran, accused the U.S. in a written message to an international conference on combating terrorism that opened in Tehran Saturday.
					 He pointed to American drone strikes in Pakistan and Afghanistan under the pretext of "anti-terrorism" that killed scores of civilians.
					
					 "The U.S. and European governments that follow it describe Palestinian combatant groups who fight for liberation of their land as terrorists," Khamenei said.
					
					 However, he said, Israeli military strikes against civilian targets or assassination of Palestinians by Israeli security agents are not condemned by the West as acts of terrorism.

articles.title: Iran's Commander on Ineffective Enemy Plots against Iran
articles.content:
Iran's Commander on Ineffective Enemy Plots against Iran
 Tehran, June 29 (KCNA) -- Chief of Staff of Iran's Armed Forces Major General Hassan Firouzabadi reiterated that the hegemonic powers' threats and plots against Tehran will not affect the Iranian nation's drive for progress. He said this in an interview with a newspaper recently.
					 The hegemonic powers have frequently sought to overthrow the Islamic system but failed each time as the culture of defense and resistance foiled their plots, he said.
					
					 He stated that the Iranian nation has stood up to the threats and conspiracies of the global arrogance.

articles.title: Iran Dismisses US-Imposed Sanctions on Iran Air: Official
articles.content:
Iran Dismisses US-Imposed Sanctions on Iran Air: Official
 Tehran, June 29 (KCNA) -- Iran Air's chairman Farhad Parvaresh dismissed fresh U.S. sanctions against the country's state-owned airline on June 25.
					 The U.S. Administration on June 23 decided to impose the sanctions on Iran's national airline, alleging that Iran Air is used by the country's Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps and Ministry of Defense and Armed Forces Logistics to transport military related equipment. He said that the airline is committed to the international aviation law.
					
					 The charges are completely denied by the Islamic Republic, he added.

articles.title: CIS Council of Heads of State Calls for World Free from War and Disputes
articles.content:
CIS Council of Heads of State Calls for World Free from War and Disputes
						
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The Council of Heads of State of the Commonwealth of Independent States recently released an appeal to the peoples of its member nations and the international community on the 70th anniversary of the start of the Great Patriotic War.
					 Fascist Germany and its followers invaded the Soviet Union on June 22, 1941, the appeal said, adding the people of the CIS turned out to defend the country and fought together to defeat the enemies, firmly convinced of the justice of their struggle. 
					
					 The 70th anniversary reminds one of the lesson that such a war should not be allowed to repeat itself and aggressors can never evade punishment, it noted.
					
					 It called on the international community to pool efforts in the struggle to build a world free from war, disputes and violence.

articles.title: Belorussian President Rejects West's Accusations
articles.content:
Belorussian President Rejects West's Accusations
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Belorussian President Aleksandr Lukashenko at a press conference on June 23 rejected the West's accusations against his country.
					 Some Western politicians blared that Belarus is earning a lot of funds through arms dealing every year. In this regard he dismissed the accusations as foolish and stupid rhetoric of those who know nothing about his country.
					
					 If it is true, there will be no financial shortage in his country, he added.

articles.title: PLO Decides to Submit Written Request to UN
articles.content:
PLO Decides to Submit Written Request to UN
						
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- The Palestine Liberation Organization formally decided to submit a written request on recognition of the Palestinian independent state to the UN General Assembly in September this year.
					 The decision was made at a meeting of the PLO Executive Committee held in Ramallah City on June 26.
					
					 The PLO called upon all the countries of the world to support it.

articles.title: AU Executive Council Meets
articles.content:
AU Executive Council Meets
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the Executive Council of the African Union was held in the capital city of Equatorial Guinea on June 26.
					 Present there were government delegates of the AU members states.
					
					 Discussed at the meeting were the matter of preparations for the AU summit and measures to decrease the number of young unemployed in the continent and tide over various crises.

articles.title: Uzbekistan Combats Illicit Drugs
articles.content:
Uzbekistan Combats Illicit Drugs
						
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Uzbekistan's National Security Service burned 675 kilograms of seized drugs on the suburbs of Tashkent on Friday.
					 Friday's burning ceremony came ahead of the International Day against Drug Abuse and Illicit Trafficking on Sunday.
					
					 It has destroyed 47.5 tons of drugs since 1994.

articles.title: Anti-Terror Operations Intensified in Dagestan
articles.content:
Anti-Terror Operations Intensified in Dagestan
 Moscow, June 29 (KCNA) -- The Republic of Dagestan of the Russian Federation has conducted several anti-terror operations this year, said the Interior Ministry of Dagestan recently.
					 100 armed bandits were killed, 118 arrested and hundreds of weapons and plenty of material used for manufacturing explosives were impounded.

articles.title: Natural Disasters in Various Countries
articles.content:
Natural Disasters in Various Countries 
						
 Pyongyang, June 30 (KCNA) -- Typhoon and hail that hit 21 provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities of China in June killed 16 people and caused economic losses amounting to 2.58 billion RMB.Y, said the Ministry of Civil Affairs and the Office of the National Disaster Reduction Commission.
					 Tropical storm in northern Philippines left one dead and 17 missing, said the National Disaster and Risk Reduction Management Council on June 26. The number of victims totaled more than 723 370.
					
					 Downpour that persisted in northern Vietnam from June 22 claimed huge damage with 17 dead, 4 unaccounted for and more than 60 wounded as of June 27.
					
					Hundreds of houses were destroyed and 16,000 hectares of farmland were inundated or washed away.
					
					Forest fires in New Mexico State, the U.S. burnt 30 buildings and 50,000 acres of forest on June 26.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il enva mensaje de felicitacin a Hu Jintao
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il enva mensaje de felicitacin a Hu Jintao
Pyongyang, 30 de junio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comit de Defensa Nacional de la Repblica Popular Democrtica de Corea, envi el da 30 un mensaje de felicitacin a Hu Jintao, Secretario General del Comit Central del Partido Comunista de China y Presidente de la Repblica Popular China.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					En ocasin del 90 aniversario de la fundacin del Partido Comunista de China, hago llegar en nombre del Comit Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y en el mo propio, la ms calurosa felicitacin y el saludo camaraderil a Vd. y, por su conducto, al CC del PCCh y a todos los militantes de vuestro partido y al pueblo chino. 
					
					La fundacin del PCCh fue un evento histrico que prepar un motivo de viraje decisivo en la revolucin china y en la forja del destino del pueblo chino. 
					
					Gracias a la fundacin del PCCh, el pueblo chino pudo tener su verdadera organizacin vanguardista directriz, eliminar la penuria y el atraso seculares y crear los milagros que sorprenden a todo el mundo con la gran lucha y creacin por la prosperidad del pas. 
					
					Desde los primeros das de su fundacin, el PCCh logr grandes triunfos al organizar y dirigir la lucha revolucionaria ensangrentada contra los imperialistas y los reaccionarios internos y levant sobre el vasto territorio chino una nueva China socialista. 
					
					El PCCh present la lnea de construccin del socialismo con peculiaridades chinas conveniente a la realidad concreta de su pas y llam activamente el entusiasmo creativo de las amplias masas. De esta manera, fortaleci extraordinariamente en un corto plazo histrico el podero estatal general y la posicin internacional del pas. 
					
					  La trayectoria victoriosa de los 90 aos recorrida por el PCCh manifest plenamente la justeza y la vitalidad invicta de la direccin del Partido Comunista y de la causa socialista.
					
					  Nuestro partido y pueblo felicitan sinceramente todos los xitos que alcanza el pueblo chino en la construccin socialista bajo la direccin del PCCh, considerndolos como los suyos. 
					
					  Hoy da, el pueblo chino entr en la nueva marcha por conquistar la magna meta del 12 plan quinquenal y construir una sociedad socialista armoniosa basada en la concepcin de desarrollo cientfico. 
					
					  Deseo de todo corazn que el PCCh que tiene a Vd. como Secretario General, asegure la estabilidad de la sociedad y logre el desarrollo sostenido de la economa manteniendo con firmeza el ideal de gobernacin por el pueblo, para as lograr mayores xitos en el cumplimiento de la causa por construir globalmente una sociedad rica en lo bsico y realizar la reunificacin completa de todo el pas. 
					
					  Hoy, la tradicional amistad Corea-China acoge una nueva era de prosperidad por los esfuerzos conjuntos de ambas partes, promueve enrgicamente la construccin socialista de los dos pases y hace gran aporte a la paz y la estabilidad de la regin.
					
					  Defender, consolidar y desarrollar constantemente la amistad Corea-China, riqueza valiosa comn de los dos partidos y los pueblos de los dos pases, es la firme posicin de nuestro partido. 
					
					  Estoy seguro de que la tradicional amistad Corea-China se desarrollarn con ms vigor generacin tras generacin de acuerdo con la aspiracin y anhelo comunes de los dos partidos y los pueblos de los dos pases y deseo de todo corazn que bajo la gua del PCCh, la Repblica Popular China prospere y el pueblo chino sea feliz.

articles.title: CRPP revela propsito de desarrollo de lugar de turismo del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CRPP revela propsito de desarrollo de lugar de turismo del Sur de Corea
						
Pyongyang, 30 de junio (ATCC) -- La banda de tteres surcoreanos public el supuesto "proyecto de desarrollo general de 5 islas del Mar Oeste" cuyo  ncleo es desarrollar 5 islas del Mar Oeste de Corea incluyendo las Paekryong y Yonphyong como zonas de turismo internacional.
					El secretariado del Comit por la Reunificacin Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP), en su informacin no. 974 fechada 30, denunci que los tteres surcoreanos intentan convertir las 5 islas del Mar Oeste y sus alrededores martimos, zonas ms agudas, en la zona de turismo internacional, lo cual es un peligroso juego como si se construyera el lugar de recreo sobre el polvorn. 
					
					La banda de los traidores intenta usar la zona desmilitarizada de la lnea de demarcacin militar como "zona de turismo por la seguridad" y "parque ecolgico por la paz" y utilizarla  a la  campaa conflictiva anti-RPDC y a la ganancia de dinero, comienza la nota y prosigue:
					
					Tal campaa de desarrollo de lugar de turismo deviene vil invento de un negociante como Lee Myung Bak que no sabe la tragedia de la divisin nacional y la vergenza de la confrontacin fratricida. 
					
					Es tambin una burla a la opinin pblica interna y externa y una provocacin contra la RPDC porque ella habla de tal desarrollo de "lugar de turismo internacional" aumentando en gran escala sus fuerzas armadas en dichas 5 islas y sus contornos matimos y creando hasta la comandancia de defensa de las islas del noroeste.
					
					Tal objetivo reside en encubrir sus criminales preparativos de guerra de agresin a la RPDC, justificar como hecho consumado la ilegal y fantasma "lnea de lmite al Norte" y obtener el reconocimiento sobre el derecho de posesin de aguas del Mar Oeste.
					
					En particular, radica en calmar la opinin pblica de los moradores isleos y otros surcoreanos que estn inquietos y pnicos por las frenticas maniobras blicas de los belicistas tteres, y enfrentar militarmente con la RPDC usando a los habitantes de esta zona y hasta a los turistas como escudo humano.
					
					En la guerra no hay la misericordia y no estar a salvo aunque sea el lugar de turismo.

articles.title: CRPP da a la publicidad el aviso a Chongwadae
articles.content:
CRPP da a la publicidad el aviso a Chongwadae
Pyongyang, 30 de junio (ATCC) -- El Comit por la Reunificacin de la Patria (CRPP) trat de enviar el da 29 por va Phanmunjom un aviso urgente a las autoridades surcoreanas, en relacin con que en estos das la "unidad Paekgol" y otras del ejrcito ttere surcoreano en el frente insultan perversamente  la mxima dignidad, el rgimen y el ejrcito de la Repblica Popular Democrtica de Corea.
					Pero, las autoridades tteres, inquietadas por su culpabilidad, no lo aceptaron con algunos pretextos injustos. 
					
					Por eso, el CRPP da a la publicidad el texto completo de ese aviso:
					
					Segn informaciones de prensa surcoreana, las unidades en el frente incluso la "unidad Paekgol" emplazada en Cholwon de la provincia de Kangwon del Sur de Corea colocaron en los cuarteles, los puestos, los establecimientos militares y hasta en los muros las consignas, que insultan la mxima dignidad, el rgimen y el ejrcito de la RPDC y fomentan la hostilidad a sta.
					
					Esto es una gran provocacin nunca tolerable y declaracin de guerra contra ella.
					
					Cuando la capa militar surcoreana cometi una locura nunca perdonable de disparar sobre los blancos que ofenden la mxima dignidad de la RPDC, sta revel la gravedad del caso y demand fuertemente pedir el perdn inmediato, castigar a los promotores y tomar las medidas preventivas de casos similares. 
					
					Entonces, el Sur de Corea expres la disculpa a la parte Norte diciendo que "fue una cosa inconveniente" y que tom las "medidas correspondientes en las unidades adscritas".
					
					Sin embargo, volvi a perpetrar otras provocaciones brutales, revelando por s mismo que todas sus palabras fueron mentiras y que el autor de la provocacin es precisamente Chongwadae (casa azul) y cabecillas de la capa militar.
					
					 La parte Sur debe pedir disculpas inmediatas por sus recientes provocaciones, castigar severamente a los promotores, eliminar todas las consignas malignas y parar sin demora las imprudentes locuras provocativas. 
					
					Si la parte Sur sigue tolerando las provocaciones que insultan la mxima dignidad, el rgimen y el ejrcito de nuestra parte, la RPDC responder con la represalia militar total y castigos implacables, como  ya ha aclarado en las declaraciones anteriores.

articles.title: Sur de Corea obstaculiza el turismo internacional al monte Kumgang
articles.content:
Sur de Corea obstaculiza el turismo internacional al monte Kumgang
Pyongyang, 30 de junio (ATCC) -- En relacin con que no se realizaron las negociaciones para arreglar los bienes inmuebles del Sur de Corea dentro de la Zona Especial del monte Kumgang debido a las autoridades tteres surcoreanas, el portavoz de la Direccin de la Zona Especial del Turismo Internacional al Monte Kumgang respondi el da 30 a la pregunta de un reportero de la Agencia Telegrfica Central de Corea como sigue:
					Segn el aviso de la Direccin de la Zona Especial del Turismo Internacional al Monte Kumgang de la Repblica Popular Democrtica de Corea, llegaron el da 29 al monte Kumgang los interesados de la parte Sur para arreglar los bienes incluso los inmuebles en esa zona.
					
					Pero, son nada ms que 4 los interesados de las empresas civiles que tienen sus bienes en dicho monte  y otros de ms de 30 empresas medianas y pequeas no pudieron venir por el impedimento del Ministerio ttere de Reunificacin.
					
					Adems, en lugar de ellos, vinieron varios relacionados con las autoridades surcoreanas y obstaculizaron los trabajos de los interesados empresariales.
					
					Tan pronto como llegaron al monte Kumgang, el jefe de seccin del Ministerio de Reunificacin y otros relacionados con las autoridades surcoreanas llevaron a los interesados de empresas civiles a un cuadro, que no es el lugar de consulta, y les impidieron el encuentro con nuestra parte proponiendo las negociaciones entre las autoridades. Y dijeron persistentemente que volveran cuando la parte Norte no haga  negociaciones con s mismos. 
					
					Negaron sin razn la posicin de la parte Norte de aclarar su decisin ante todos los interesados surcoreanos y regresaron sin decir nada segn el mando de Sel junto con los interesados de las empresas civiles.
					
					En fin de cuentas, el Ministerio ttere de Reunificacin vino al monte Kumgang con algunos interesados empresariales por no poder resistir la presin de la opinin pblica interna y externa. Su verdadera intencin no es "proteger el derecho a los bienes" de las empresas surcoreanas, sino obstaculizar el arreglo de bienes inmuebles y llevar al fracaso de todos modos el turismo internacional al monte Kumgang.
					
					Debido a las maniobras insolentes de estorbo del Ministerio ttere de Reunificacin, no se han realizado las negociaciones para el arreglo de los bienes inmuebles de la parte surcoreana. Dado que no poda entregar directamente a los interesados empresariales surcoreanos nuestro proyecto de arreglo de bienes, la parte Norte enva un aviso sobre el respecto por conducto de los relacionados de las empresas surcoreanas como el Grupo Hyundai que estn en el monte Kumgang. 
					
					La nota exige a todos los interesados surcoreanos que tienen sus bienes en el monte Kumgang  entrar hasta el 13 de julio que viene al monte Kumgang con un proyecto de arreglo de bienes y aclara que en cuanto a quienes no entren hasta ese da, considerar como  abandono del derecho a los bienes y har un tratamiento  legal correspondiente. 
					
					Como muestran todos los hechos, el fracaso de las presentes negociaciones para el arreglo de los bienes inmuebles en el monte Kumgang se debe enteramente a la obstaculizacin malintencionada del Ministerio ttere de Reunificacin acaudillado por Hyon In Thaek, monstruoso maniaco de confrontacin.
					
					Sin embargo, los interesados de esta cartera ttere difunden ahora los rumores que convierten lo blanco en lo negro. 
					
					Hacemos todos los esfuerzos sinceros por tratar imparcialmente los bienes de las empresas surcoreanas.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben poner de inmediato fin a sus maniobras groseras tendentes a llevar al fracaso el turismo internacional al monte Kumgang y facilitar a las empresas surcoreanas arreglar de manera legtima sus bienes inmuebles. 
					
					En el caso contrario, las empresas surcoreanas sufrirn los daos por el respecto y tal responsabilidad recaer enteramente sobre las autoridades surcoreanas.

articles.title: Capitalinos denuncian complot anti-RPDC de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Capitalinos denuncian complot anti-RPDC de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 30 de junio (ATCC) -- Al enterarse de las declaraciones de los portavoces de la Comandancia Suprema del Ejrcito Popular de Corea y del Gobierno de la Repblica Popular Democrtica de Corea, el pueblo coreano arden de vehemente indignacin a la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak que sigue perpetrando provocaciones de psima calaa.
					El morador en el capitalino municipio de Taesong, Jang In Gap (51 aos de edad) dijo:
					
					Todo el pueblo coreano est indignado por el hecho de que la banda de Lee volvi a denigrar el sistema y la dignidad de nuestra Repblica. Tal alboroto nunca ser tolerable. Debemos aplastarla sin falta con las armas justas.
					
					Kim Kwang Gun (de 49 aos de edad), viceministro de Industria Mecnica apunt:
					
					El traidor Lee Myung Bak y cabecillas de la capa militar ttere del Sur de Corea son los autores de los presentes alborotos anti-Repblica que realizan abiertamente la unidad "Paekgol" y las otras en el frente del ejrcito ttere surcoreano colgando hasta las malvadas consignas y pancartas. Esto deviene un desafo frontal contra la Repblica Popular Democrtica de Corea y una declaracin de guerra.
					
					Los repetidos actos provocativos en junio son complot de enfrentamiento fratricida impulsado sistemticamente desde hace mucho tiempo.
					
					Lee Myung Pak practicaba poltica hostil a la connacional Repblica Popular Democrtica de Corea y de dependencia de las fuerzas extranjeras, con lo cual no hubo ni un paso de avance en  los esfuerzos por realizar la reunificacin de la patria, anhelo de todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar, y por lograr la paz y la estabilidad en la Pennsula Coreana.
					
					La conferenciante del Pabelln Central de Educacin Clasista, Ryang Jong Gum (44 aos de edad) subray:
					
					La mxima dignidad de la Repblica es la dignidad y el honor comn de la nacin. El pueblo coreano se movilizar como un solo hombre para defenderlos. La banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak, que se entrega a la confrontacin anti-RPDC difamando hasta la mxima dignidad de la Repblica, es el enemigo comn de la nacin a ser eliminado cuanto antes.

articles.title: Premier coreano recorre Complejo de Acero Chollima
articles.content:
Premier coreano recorre Complejo de Acero Chollima
						
Pyongyang, 30 de junio (ATCC) -- El premier coreano Choe Yong Rim averigu el da 29 en el terreno el estado de produccin del Complejo de Acero Chollima.
					Tras recorrer el taller de laminacin de blooming, el de laminacin y los talleres de materias primas y horno giratorio de la Fundicin de Hierro de Posan, el premier convoc la reunin de consulta.
					
					En la ocasin se abordaron el problema de suministrar suficientes materiales de acero necesarios para los lugares de construccin de objetos importantes incluyendo la de la zona de Mansudae y otros asuntos prcticos para transportar all a tiempo las chatarras a dicho Complejo.
